biocontainers.name: rnahybrid
biocontainers.summary: Tool for finding the minimum free energy hybridization of a long and a short rna. the hybridization is performed in a kind of domain mode, ie. the short sequence is hybridized to the best fitting part of the long one. the tool is primarily meant as a means for microrna target prediction.

biotools.summary: Tool for finding the minimum free energy hybridization of a long and a short RNA. The hybridization is performed in a kind of domain mode, ie. the short sequence is hybridized to the best fitting part of the long one. The tool is primarily meant as a means for microRNA target prediction.

bioschemas.name: RNAhybrid
bioschemas.summary: Tool for finding the minimum free energy hybridization of a long and a short RNA. The hybridization is performed in a kind of domain mode, ie. the short sequence is hybridized to the best fitting part of the long one. The tool is primarily meant as a means for microRNA target prediction.
